action.werewolves.human_form.desc: Unlocks the first humanlike werewolf form
action.werewolves.rage.desc: Temporarily deal more damage to your targets
action.werewolves.beast_form.desc: Unlocks the Beast Form, which focuses on improved attack power
action.werewolves.howling.desc: Boosts the attack speed of yourself and your fellow werewolves
action.werewolves.survival_form.desc: Unlocks the Survivalist Form, which focuses on speed
action.werewolves.leap.desc: Leap into the direction you're looking by pressing an extra key when jumping
action.werewolves.fear.desc: Nearby mobs are frightened of you and run away
action.werewolves.hide_name.desc: Hide your name while in any werewolf form
skill.werewolves.sixth_sense.desc: If you are targeted by a nearby mob your screen flashes
skill.werewolves.night_vision.desc: Lets you see in the night when in werewolf form
skill.werewolves.stun_bite.desc: Your bite attack temporarily makes the target unable to move
skill.werewolves.bleeding_bite.desc: Your bite attack inflicts deep wounds on the target, draining blood and damage over time
skill.werewolves.damage.desc: Permanently deal more damage in werewolf form
skill.werewolves.resistance.desc: Increase your resistance in werewolf form
skill.werewolves.speed.desc: Run faster when in werewolf form
skill.werewolves.movement_tactics.desc: Adds a chance to dodge attacks while sprinting in werewolf form
skill.werewolves.throat_seeker.desc: Adds a chance to instantly kill entities when attacking from behind (target health needs to be below 25%)
skill.werewolves.climber.desc: Automatically step up blocks when in Survivalist Form
skill.werewolves.wolf_pawn.desc: Receive no damage from blocks like cacti, berry bushes & magma blocks and receive less damage from falling
skill.werewolves.not_meat.desc: Be able to eat food that's not meat
skill.werewolves.water_lover.desc: Receive no de-buff from being under water
skill.werewolves.free_will.desc: You are no longer forced into werewolf form at full moon
skill.werewolves.wear_armor.desc: You are able to wear armor
skill.werewolves.silver_blooded.desc: The effect silver has on you is reduced
text.werewolves.stone_altar.ritual_wrong: You can not progress further at this altar
text.werewolves.stone_altar.ritual_night: The ritual is only working at night
text.werewolves.stone_altar.ritual_to_le: You need to snatch more prey
text.werewolves.stone_altar.empty_hand: Use an empty hand to open the inventory
text.werewolves.no_meat: Why should I try this food? I know that it will not satisfy me.
text.werewolves.werewolf_minion.equipmen: Thank you for the strong talisman. Please choose in which area I should use the new energy.
This talisman is not strong enough.
text.werewolves.basic_werewolf.minion.un: You seem to be a strong werewolf, but I am not on the search for new tribe.
text.werewolves.basic_werewolf.minion.av: I would love to subordinate for such a strong werewolf as you are.
text.werewolves.basic_werewolf.minion.no: However, I think you are not strong enough for a bigger tribe.
text.werewolves.basic_werewolf.minion.st: Thank you for the charm, I will serve you now and do as you command.
text.werewolves.basic_werewolf.minion.re: If you provide me with proper equipment, in form of a %s item, I will work for you.
gui.vampirism.taskmaster.text.werewolves:
Be not afraid
, your secret is safe with me and if you intend to help us with a few things we can protect this village from unwanted disturbance and you will be rewarded upon completion. Please browse the available tasks and accept any you like.
guide.werewolves.entity.werewolf.title: Werewolf
guide.werewolves.werewolf.leveling.intro: After becoming a werewolf you probably want to become stronger by leveling up. To level up you need to complete rituals at night.
guide.werewolves.werewolf.lord.text:
You can not find other werewolves that can withstand you? Then it is time for you to make your own tribe and make them your follower. This will allow you to control them and give them tasks.
To become a werewolf lord you must reach the highest werewolf level first. Then the %s should offer you a special task which, upon completion, grants you the right to name yourself %s and to control minions.
You can level up to a %s by completing more tasks to be allowed to control more minions
guide.werewolves.werewolf.lord.minion: To obtain a minion you will need a %s item. Look for a weak werewolf NPC and right-click your chosen minion with it. It should then be under your control and you can order it to e.g. defend you or collect food. If you want to have the best of the best you can additional enhance the minion capabilities using the hard to obtain %s or %s or %s respectively. For each level they receive an additional stat point that you can assign
guide.werewolves.werewolf.un_werewolf.te: If you decide to get rid of your curse, you need to inject yourself with a %s at an %s. To obtain such an injection collect a strange fluid only obtainable from werewolves by interacting with them with an empty Syringe.
guide.werewolves.werewolf.getting_starte: To become a werewolf you have to be scratched by a werewolf. So either let them attack you or just wait until it happens by accident. When they attack you there is a chance, you receive a potion effect called "Lupus Sanguinem" which will last as long you are not sleeping. After you wake up you become a werewolf. In case you don't want to become one, you can always cancel the effect with a milk bucket.\n

As Werewolf one of the main features is, that you can transform your body into werewolf model. A difference to other factions is, that you are only recognized as werewolf when you are showing you werewolf form.

A new thing that you must be aware of is that you are now especially vulnerable to silver item like Silver Swords or Silver Bolts. The silver effect does not only slows you down, but also reduces your defense strong fur.\nThis is especially strong against your werewolf form, since you can not wear armor in your transformed form.

In your progression to a high level werewolf you will have some skill choices to make. One mayor decision is based on if you want to become a Beast, Survivalist or want to stay humane, while they are not mutual exclusive they each have some defining attributes. This decisions will unlock further skill option.
guide.werewolves.werewolf.skills.text: As werewolf you can unlock skills, With each levelup you receive one skill point you can use.\nOpen the skill GUI with %s.
guide.werewolves.werewolf.skills.decisio:
A big decision you need to decide it how you want to play as werewolf, since there are three different path you can take:\nBeast:
 The Beast will target a brutal fighting build\nSurvivalist:
 The Survivalist will target a more swift build\nHuman:
 The Human has access to utility features
guide.werewolves.werewolf.leveling.stone: To level at the stone altar you require a certain structure. It must be night that you can interact with the altar, then insert the required items and click the altar with %s or a %s then the ritual will start.

§lStructure§r\nThe ritual needs a composition of blocks to function. The most important on is the %s with which you will interact. Secondly there must be four %s in a 3 blocks radius around the %s. Once everything is placed you can lit the %s with %s.
For the ritual there are three requirements to perform the ritual. Two items and a level of slayed creatures. There amount increases for higher level
guide.werewolves.blocks.stone_altar.text: Multiblock structure. Used to level up as Werewolf
guide.werewolves.blocks.stone_altar_fire: Multiblock structure. Used to level up as Werewolf
guide.werewolves.werewolf.slayed_creatur: Besides item to level up you also need to kill creatures. The progress is shown in the Vampirism Menu. The creature amount shown in the level requirements represents the sum of the max health of all creatures you must killed.
guide.werewolves.items.oil_bottle.plant_: Plant Oil is the base to every other oil and as such required to craft them
guide.werewolves.items.oil_bottle.silver: Silver oil can be applied to any Sword in the crafting grid. Once applied the Sword will deal more damage against Werewolves but only for a limited time until the silver oil has worn off.
guide.werewolves.items.werewolf_minion_c:
The %s can be used by werewolf lord to make a werewolf NPC their follower by right clicking them.
Depending on the current level of the minion %s (%s-%s), %s (%s-%s) or %s (%s-%s) can be used respectively to improve the capabilities of a minion by one level each and gain an additional stat point.
These items can be obtained as rewards from a %s.
guide.werewolves.items.accessories.text:
Werewolf accessories are unique items that can be equipped in the Vampirism menu.
They can be obtained as task reward, found in chest or as loot.
Each accessory provides a specific set of buffs, de-buffs or changes to your abilities and skills
 Once equipped they are bound to you and can only be destroyed or replaced.
WHen you respawn, they are damaged.
guide.werewolves.items.werewolf_tooth.te: The %s is needed for werewolf lord leveling and dropped by %s
minion_task.werewolves.collect_werewolf_: I will head out and hunt for prey
refinement.werewolves.werewolf_form_dura: Allows you to be longer in werewolf form
Allows you to be much longer in werewolf form
Allows you to be longer in survival werewolf form
Allows you to be much longer in survival werewolf form
Allows you to be longer in beast werewolf form
Allows you to be much longer in beast werewolf form
refinement.werewolves.rage_fury.desc: Increases Rage action duration and damage upon killing an entity
Regenerate more health after a kill
refinement.werewolves.stun_bite.desc: Stun Bite has a longer effect
refinement.werewolves.bleeding_bite.desc: Bleeding Bite creates a bigger wound
refinement.werewolves.greater_doge_chanc: Increases the chance to doge for the Movement Tactics skill
